summary: Hoping to escape destruction by human developers and save their community, a colony of rabbits, led by Hazel and Fiver, seek out a safe place to set up a new warren.
cast: John Hurt|Richard Briers|Michael Graham Cox|John Bennett|Ralph Richardson|Simon Cadell|Terence Rigby|Roy Kinnear|Richard O'Callaghan|Denholm Elliott|Lynn Farleigh|Mary Maddox|Zero Mostel|Harry Andrews|Hannah Gordon|Nigel Hawthorne|Clifton Jones|Derek Griffiths|Michael Hordern|Joss Ackland|Michelle Price
title: Orejas largas
